summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Nexodify AVA Label Compliance Preflight React application. All core functionality working correctly including landing page, auth pages, navigation, form validations, responsive design, and UI components.

backend_issues.notes: No backend testing performed as this is frontend-only implementation. External backend at https://api.nexodify.com does not exist yet (expected).

integration_issues.issue: CORS errors when attempting API calls to https://api.nexodify.com
integration_issues.notes: This is expected behavior since the external backend does not exist yet

design_issues.notes: Hot reload WebSocket connection failing but doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section, navigation, and CTA buttons
Login page renders with email/password fields and forgot password link
Register page renders with all required fields (name, company, email, password)
Forgot password page renders with email field and back navigation
Navigation between auth pages works correctly (login ↔ register ↔ forgot password)
Form validations work (email format, password length, password confirmation)
UI components render correctly (buttons, cards, inputs, images)
Responsive design works on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844)
All buttons are clickable and interactive
Typography and color contrast are appropriate
Layout and spacing are proper across all sections
